main event: A witness reported seeing a saucer-shaped object that emitted a brilliant light and hovered for a few minutes before taking off rapidly in Cowlesville, New York on September 1st, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be made of polished chrome or aluminum,The witness described the light as being so bright that it almost blinded them,The object was about 30 feet in diameter,The sighting occurred at 9:50 PM at a distance of about 50 yards,The area was lit up as bright as day when the object took off.
witness description: an employee at the Baia Grande Field Club
